title: Ensuring Data Integrity Using Blockchain Technology
abstract: Blockchain is a relatively new technology that has shown a lot of possibilities. It emerged in 2009 as a public ledger of all Bitcoin transactions. Blockchain technology is finding applications in wide range of areas: digital assets and stocks, smart contracts, record keeping, ID systems, cloud storage, ride sharing, etc. We investigate the blockchainsâ€™ activity in terms of how to store, retrieve and share files in decentralized network.
